var.name: p6
var.labl: P6. Environmentally improved crop production methods are ways of growing food th

qstn.qstnLit: P6. Environmentally improved crop production methods are ways of growing food that help protect the environment and make sure we have healthy and safe food. Would your household be interested in learning these crop production methods?

var.name: p7
var.labl: P7. Chemical pesticides are lab-made and quickly kill pests but can harm the env

qstn.qstnLit: P7. Chemical pesticides are lab-made and quickly kill pests but can harm the environment. Biological pesticides use living things like bugs or bacteria, work more slowly, and are safer for the environment and other animals. They're like strong medicine versus natural helpers for your plants.Would your household be interested in learning about biological pesticides?

var.name: result
var.labl: FINAL RESULT CODE FOR HOUSEHOLD INTERVIEW

qstn.qstnLit: Household Final Result
Date of visit
Time Started
qstn.ivuInstr: Example: 02:00 pm

qstn.qstnLit: Time Ended
Result of Visit

var.name: interview__id
var.labl: Unique 32-character long identifier of the interview

var.name: rel
var.labl: Relationship to the head of this household

qstn.qstnLit: HL2: What is your/%rostertitle%'s relationship to the head/reference person of this household?
Specify Other relative
HL3: What is your/%rostertitle%'s sex?
HL4: How old are you/is %rostertitle% now?
qstn.ivuInstr: 0 = less than 1 year old DK/NS is not allowed for age

qstn.qstnLit: HL5: Which ethnic group do you/does %rostertitle% identify with most?
qstn.ivuInstr: If response is "MIXED", Probe and ask which ethnic group the respondent identifies with the most.

qstn.qstnLit: Specify Other ethnic group
ED1: Are you/Is %rostertitle% presently attending school?
ED2: In what class/form/level of education are you/is %rostertitle% presently?
ED3: What was the last standard/form/level you have/%rostertitle% has completed?
EM1: Are you/Is %rostertitle% currently employed or working for payment? (includes self employed)
qstn.ivuInstr: If no, probe for any recent economic activity. Includes the self employed

var.name: workertype
var.labl: Type of worker in main job

qstn.qstnLit: EM2: What type of worker best describes you/ %rostertitle% in your MAIN job?
qstn.ivuInstr: [READ LIST]

catgry.labl: Employee of government, quasi government, or NGO
Employee of a private employer or company
